Title: How to recommend candidates
Designer: Office of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress
Publisher: Zhongguo minzhu fazhi chubanshe (中国民主法制出版社)
Notes: Part of the series Elections of delegates from urban and rural districts for the new session of the National People's Congress (2011).All organizations, groups, etc. can recommend candidates. Groups of 10 or more people from the same electoral district can recommend candidates.
Theme: Political ReformLegal KnowledgeElections of delegates from urban and rural districts for the new session of the National People's Congress (2011)
